meditation.focusBreathing: Focus on your breathing. Let thoughts come and go without judgment. Visualize successful, calm trading decisions.

patterns.title: Behavioral Patterns
patterns.subtitle: Identify and track your trading psychology patterns
patterns.focusOnPatterns: Focus on emotional stop moving and FOMO trading for immediate improvement.

patternDescriptions.fomoTrading: Entering trades impulsively due to fear of missing out on price movements
patternDescriptions.revengeTrading: Increasing position sizes after losses to recover quickly
patternDescriptions.overconfidence: Taking larger risks after a series of winning trades
patternDescriptions.analysisParalysis: Over-analyzing setups and missing trading opportunities
patternDescriptions.emotionalStops: Moving stop losses when trades go against the initial plan

patterns.patternFrequencyTrendsDesc: Track how your behavioral patterns change over time

landing.title: ProFitz
landing.subtitle: Psychology Lab
landing.description: Master your trading psychology with AI-powered coaching, behavioral analysis, and interactive exercises designed to build mental resilience and better decision-making.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Master Trading Psychology
landing.featuresSubtitle: Our comprehensive platform combines cutting-edge AI with proven psychological techniques
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: A simple 4-step process to transform your trading psychology
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: Join thousands of traders who have transformed their mindset
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Master Your Trading Psychology?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join ProFitz today and start your journey toward consistent, disciplined trading.
landing.footerTagline: Transforming traders through AI-powered psychology coaching.
landing.feature1Desc: Get personalized psychological guidance powered by advanced AI to improve your trading mindset.
landing.feature2Desc: Identify and understand your recurring trading behaviors and psychological biases.
landing.feature3Desc: Engage with CBT exercises, meditations, and simulations designed for traders.
landing.feature4Desc: Advanced AI analyzes your trades to identify psychological patterns and suggest improvements for better performance.
landing.feature5Desc: Plan and structure your trades with psychological checkpoints to ensure disciplined execution.
landing.feature6Desc: Real-time market psychology indicators and sentiment analysis to help you make informed decisions.
landing.feature7Desc: Upload trading screenshots for AI-powered analysis of your decision-making and emotional state.
landing.feature8Desc: Monitor your psychological development with detailed metrics and performance reports.
landing.feature9Desc: Earn badges and rewards as you develop better trading psychology and discipline.
landing.feature10Desc: Access structured learning paths covering all aspects of trading psychology.
landing.feature11Desc: Journal your trades and emotions with guided prompts for deeper self-analysis.
landing.step1Desc: Take our comprehensive trader personality profile to understand your psychological baseline.
landing.step2Desc: Receive personalized guidance from our AI psychology coach based on your unique profile.
landing.step3Desc: Engage with interactive exercises, courses, and reflection tools to build new habits.
landing.step4Desc: Monitor your psychological development with detailed analytics and celebrate milestones.

dashboard.overview: Here's your trading psychology progress overview
